quest.name: Not the Beavers
journal:
Uin Nee eagerly awaits a delivery of flowers, and slightly less eagerly awaits the return of a friend who may have met a terrible fate.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Speak with the flower-picking pixie in the east of Phisor Lran and throw porxies to scare off any threats.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Forename, I need your help! My friend went to pick flowers a while ago, but no one has seen hide nor hair of them since!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: I suspect it was the work of─ No, it's too soon to say for certain.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: The best thing to do is send out a search party, consisting of...well, you of course!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: You should probably start looking where all the prettiest flowers grow, which would be east of Phisor Lran. And if it's what I think it is, be prepared for an epic encounter that will shake the heavens! Or at least cause them to wobble a bit...

dialogue.name: PICKFLOWERPIXIE
dialogue.text: Sorry, but as you can see, I'm rather busy. Or perhaps you're here to help?

dialogue.name: PICKFLOWERPIXIE
dialogue.text: Uin Nee was worried about me? I'm quite safe, I assure you! And if anything were to disturb me, these porxies will send them on their merry way!

dialogue.name: PICKFLOWERPIXIE
dialogue.text: But since you've come all the way here, perhaps you could watch my back while I carry on picking flowers? On the off chance that any beasties show, throw one of my adorable companions at them!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If any enemies appear, throw a porxie at them. You may move the camera, as well as zoom in and out. Target the enemy and throw a porxie with [???] / [???].

dialogue.name: PICKFLOWERPIXIE
dialogue.text: Aaaaaaiiieee!

dialogue.name: PICKFLOWERPIXIE
dialogue.text: (-Another Flower-picking Pixie-)That's odd... Did you see another pixie picking flowers here? No? Oh, well. I'll just have to finish the job by myself! Tra-la-la!♪

dialogue.name: PICKFLOWERPIXIE
dialogue.text: Phew! That should be enough for the time being. So, was there any trouble? No? Jolly good. Thanks for keeping an eye out for me. Ta-ta for now!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: So, you made it back, at least.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Though to be honest, I don't have much hope of ever seeing my friend again. Do you know what happened to them?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You'd better ask the beavers.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Some things are best left a mystery.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Even when I close my eyes, I can still see the...the beavers.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: No, not the beavers! Don't let their appearance fool you; there is no greater evil in all of Il Mheg than those long-toothed horrors.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: That's fine. I'd already jumped to my own conclusions anyway!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Oooh! It sounds like you'll be having some fantastic nightmares! If you ever manage to sleep again, that is.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: In any case, it sounds like the flower collection is proceeding apace, and we'll soon be able to decorate Lyhe Mheg with beautiful flowers. And if we have to lose a pixie or three in the process, so be it!
